meaningMnemonic: Put your <radical>fingers</radical> on the <radical>bed</radical>, <kanji>grasp</kanji> the sheets and <kanji>bundle</kanji> them up. Now you can do the laundry!
readingMnemonic: In between <kanji>grasp</kanji>ing and <kanji>bundle</kanji>-ing, you shout <reading>HA</reading> (は)! That's when the sheets come off the bed.
